Enumerations

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the data structures which are exposed to the application.

Typedef Documentation

typedef enum DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd_e DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd

cfarcaProc control command

The enum defines the cfarcaProc supported run time command

typedef struct DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Config_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Config

HWA CFAR configuration.

The structure is used to hold the HWA configuration used for CFAR

typedef struct DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_DynamicConfig_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_DynamicConfig

HWA CFAR dynamic configuration.

The structure is used to hold the dynamic configuration used for CFAR

typedef struct DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Resources_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_HW_Resources

CFAR Hardware resources.

CFAR Hardware resources

typedef struct DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_HwaCfarConfig_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_HwaCfarConfig

CFAR HWA configuration.

The structure is used to hold the HWA configuration needed for CFAR

typedef struct DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_InitParams_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_InitParams

CFARCAProcHWA DPU initial configuration parameters.

The structure is used to hold the DPU initial configurations.

typedef struct DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_OutParams_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_OutParams

Output parameters populated during Processing time.

The structure is used to hold the output parameters

typedef struct DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_StaticConfig_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_StaticConfig

HWA CFAR static configuration.

The structure is used to hold the static configuration used for CFAR. The following condition must be satisfied:

   numRangeBins * numDopplerBins * sizeof(uint16_t) <= 32 KB (two HWA memory banks)

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd_e

cfarcaProc control command

The enum defines the cfarcaProc supported run time command

Enumerator
DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd_CfarRangeCfg 

Command to update CFAR configuration in range domain.

DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd_CfarDopplerCfg 

Command to update CFAR configuration in Doppler domain.

DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd_FovRangeCfg 

Command to update field of view in range domain, minimum and maximum range limits.

DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd_FovDopplerCfg 

Command to update field of view in Doppler domain, minimum and maximum Doppler limits.
